Helen Walker

WotD14 - Toxicity

Aug 9, 2015

Today's word made me consider some of the most poisonous thoughts we carry about with us. The ones that prevent us growing, prevent us building relationships, prevent us finding support.

Day14 and the word for today is #Toxicity. #Blog #PositivePostIts #BeKindToYourself http://helenwalker.net/2015/08/09/wotd14-toxicity/

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Aug 9, 2015 at 1:08pm PDT

Asking questions, being kind and being able to be appropriately vulnerable in speaking about our feelings are easy to consider the marks of weakness. Not true, these qualities are part of the kind of strength that I aspire to.
